titles.title: Death Tax Repeal Act
To repeal the Federal estate and gift taxes and the tax on generation-skipping transfers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/20/1997--Introduced. Death Tax Repeal Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the provisions of subtitle B of the Code relating to estate, gift, and generation-skipping taxes.
